name: Little Orbits - Lame Jam 26
description:
Little Orbits is a tiny puzzle-ish game about using gravity to move your spaceship. Place celestial objects around and then launch your ship, which flies according to their gravitational pulls.

Gameplay is point-and-click. It probably takes 10-15 minutes to complete.

This game was made in three days for Lame Jam 26! The theme for the jam was "Control the Environment." I hope the game is suitably lame. :)

IMPORTANT: You need an internet connection to run this game! It uses online resources and will crash if it can't load them.

Music credit: Sirius Beat - The Cosmos.
